an3.149:1: "Tīhi, bhikkhave … pe … asucinā kāyakammena, asucinā vacīkammena, asucinā manokammena – imehi kho … pe … evaṁ niraye.
an3.149:2: Tīhi, bhikkhave … pe … sucinā kāyakammena, sucinā vacīkammena, sucinā manokammena – imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge"ti.
